column4: hi, why does my resolv.conf keep changing after some time?sometimes i can't acess the net because of it.i used pppoeconf to connect to the net btw.
and ppp connections that set the DNS
it's all ok on startup but I suddenly noticed that I can't browse or do anything and when I check the resolv.conf I don't see my dns servers there.i only see 10.0.0.138(my gateway ip)
